Range Slider

v0.1a

Implementing this component

The Markup

				
	<form id="form-range" class="t-white">
		<fieldset class="form-range">
			<label for="input-width" class="range-label">Form range</label>
			<input type="range" name="range" min="0" max="500" step="10" value="250" id="input-width" class="range-input">
		</fieldset>
	</form>

The CSS: Theming

				
	/* Theming styles */
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"] {
	    background: #444;
	    border-color: #eee;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus {
	    /* Any styles specific that need to be changed when this is focused due to the initial state */
	    border-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 0.5);
	}

	/* Focus states for all thumbs */
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-webkit-slider-thumb {
	    background-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 1);
	    outline: 2px #686546 thin dotted;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-moz-range-thumb {
	    background-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 1);
	    outline: 2px #686546 thin dotted;
	    -moz-outline-radius:100%;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-ms-thumb {
	    background-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 1);
	    outline: 2px #686546 thin dotted;
	}
	/* Thumb colors */
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-thumb {
	  background: #fff;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-moz-range-thumb {
	  background: #fff;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
	  background-color: #fff;
	}
	/* Theme slider color */
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {
	  background-color: #444;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-moz-range-track {
	   background-color: #444;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-fill-upper {
	    background-color: #a9acb1;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-fill-lower {
	  background-color: #017afd;
	}
	/* Theme slider focus colors */
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-ms-fill-upper {
	    background-color: #a9acb1;
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {
	    background-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 0.5);
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-moz-range-track {
	    background-color: rgba(249, 241, 155, 0.5);
	}
	.t-white .form-range input[type="range"]:focus::-ms-fill-lower {
	    background-color: #017afd;
	}

The CSS: Reset

				
/* Resets */
/* Note: this is a fairly optional reset,
you could keep the tooltip */
.form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-tooltip {
    display: none;
}

The CSS: Component

				
/* Component */
.form-range input[type="range"] {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  appearance: none;
  border-bottom-width: 8px;
  border-left-width: 4px;
  border-radius: $trackBorderRadius;
  border-right-width: 4px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-top-width: 8px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-size: 1em;
  height: $trackHeight;
  margin: 0 0 0 -0.25em;
  padding: 0;
  /* Hides the slider so that custom slider can be made */
  width: 100%;
  /* Specific width is required for Firefox. */
}

//Thumb tracks
/* Special styling for WebKit/Blink */
.form-range input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  appearance: none;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 100%;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $thumbDimension;
  margin-top: $webkitThumbPosition;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  width: $thumbDimension;
}

/* All the same stuff for Firefox */
.form-range input[type="range"]::-moz-range-thumb {
  border: none;
  border-radius: 100%;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $thumbDimension;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  width: $thumbDimension;
}

/* All the same stuff for IE */
.form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-thumb {
  border: none;
  border-radius: 100%;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $msThumbDimension;
  margin: 10px;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  width: $msThumbDimension;
}

.form-range input[type="range"]:focus {
  outline: 1px #ddd thin dotted;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]:hover::-moz-range-track {
  height: $trackHeight;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {
  border-radius: $trackBorderRadius;
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $trackHeight;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  width: 100%;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]::-moz-range-track {
  border-radius: $trackBorderRadius;
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $trackHeight;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
  width: 100%;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-track {
  background: transparent;
  border-bottom: 17px;
  border-color: transparent;
  border-left: 10px;
  border-right: 10px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-top: 16px;
  color: transparent;
  cursor: pointer;
  height: $trackHeight;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-fill-lower {
  border-radius: $trackBorderRadius;
}
.form-range input[type="range"]::-ms-fill-upper {
  border-radius: $trackBorderRadius;
}
//fallback for IE8/9 when range is a text input
.form-range input[type="text"] {
  background: #fff;
  font-size: 1em;
  padding: 0.5em;
}
.range-label {
  display: block;
  margin: 1em 0;
}
